title: The new hextech gunblade goes through a Yasuo wind wall

embed.description: This is the new interaction between Hextech Gunblade's Active and a Yasuo wind wall. Before patch 6.9 Gunblade would not go through wind wall as it was fired from the champion to the enemy as a bullet projectile. As of patch 6.9 Hextech Gunblade now zaps the enemy and most likely isn't considered a projectile anymore; like a lux ultimate.

body: A demonstration of the new gunblade going _through_ Yasuo wind  wall in an online and private match. I'm not sure if it's intended or not due to how  the old  gunblade worked (as a gun) and how the new animation looks (as a lightning zap). other moves that are similar to the new gunblade are Lux's ultimate and Kennen's w, electrical surge.

replies.body:
Windwall only blocks projectiles.

New gunblade isnt a projectile.

Problem solved.
